resources.string: Each time your color bubble pops up on the screen, tap it as fast as you can. A point will be earned each time a bubble is tapped. Be sure to tap your own bubbles, or else you will be giving your opponent a point! Keep tapping until all the lights on the light strip change to your color or you crack your screen, whichever comes first.
Play against the machine! Choose your difficulty level and consequently, your destiny.
Each player should tap their color bubble as fast as they can while avoiding their opponentâ€™s bubbles. Be fast. Be furious. Reduce your enemy to smoldering ash.
